author: GARY STALLARD/For The Lufkin News
title: Game of brotherly love
text:
Jesse Villanueva GARY STALLARD/For The Lufkin News 
Diboll’s Jesse Villanueva (holding portrait of brother Robert) sits with his family, including father Jesus (far left), mother Ana and nephew Angel. Villanueva returned to playing football this season in memory of Robert, who died unexpectedly in January. GARY STALLARD/For The Lufkin News Jesse Villanueva 
Diboll wide receiver Jesse Villanueva lines up outside during a recent game. With one armband reading “Rob” and the other inscribed “RIP,” Villanueva has dedicated this season to his brother Robert, a former Lumberjack who died unexpectedly in January. Posted: Sunday, October 11, 2015 12:30 am Game of brotherly love By GARY STALLARD/For The Lufkin News The Lufkin News
